item.title: Menu Items
item.dc:creator: @bizberg
item.content:encoded:
Menu Items The people, food and the prime locations make us the perfect place good friends & family to come together and have great time. Everytime you perfectly dine with us. Pizza The best food is eaten with your hands.

01

02

03

Pizzas

Neapolitan Pizza

Straight-from-the-wok spicy supper with rice, prawns and bacon.

Chicago Pizza

Straight-from-the-wok spicy supper with rice, prawns and bacon.

Sicilian Pizza

Straight-from-the-wok spicy supper with rice, prawns and bacon. Burger The best food is eaten with your hands.

01

02

03

Burgers

Beef Burgers

Straight-from-the-wok spicy supper with rice, prawns and bacon.

Elk Burgers

Straight-from-the-wok spicy supper with rice, prawns and bacon.

Sicilian Pizza

Straight-from-the-wok spicy supper with rice, prawns and bacon.
